main event: A sighting occurred on 18 Feb 58 in Paynesville, W. Va. involving a very bright round, bluish-green flash of light.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a basketball,The observation lasted for 10 seconds,The source of the report was from Civilian Airlines, The report suggests the object might have been 'ball lightning', A total of one object was observed.
sighted object: very bright round bluish-green flash of light
